title: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine producer partners with a former student.

title: Merlin
description: Young warlock Merlin arrives in Camelot and becomes servant to Prince Arthur, secretly using magic to protect him.

episodes.title: The Dragon's Call
episodes.description: Merlin arrives in Camelot and learns his destiny from the Great Dragon.

episodes.title: Valiant
episodes.description: Merlin must prove that a knight uses magic to cheat in a tournament.

episodes.title: The Mark of Nimueh
episodes.description: A deadly plague spreads in Camelot, caused by magical means.

episodes.title: The Poisoned Chalice
episodes.description: Merlin is poisoned after saving Arthur from a deadly trap.

episodes.title: Lancelot
episodes.description: Merlin helps a brave peasant, Lancelot, become a knight.

episodes.title: A Remedy to Cure All Ills
episodes.description: A mysterious healer threatens Gaiusâ€™ position in Camelot.

episodes.title: The Gates of Avalon
episodes.description: Arthur falls for a girl with dark secrets from another world.

episodes.title: The Beginning of the End
episodes.description: Merlin protects a Druid boy being hunted in Camelot.

episodes.title: Excalibur
episodes.description: Uther raises a dead knight with magic; Merlin must stop him.

episodes.title: The Moment of Truth
episodes.description: Merlin returns to his village to protect it from bandits.

episodes.title: The Labyrinth of Gedref
episodes.description: Arthur faces magical punishment after killing a unicorn.

episodes.title: To Kill the King
episodes.description: Morgana considers assassinating Uther to save a friend.

episodes.title: Le Morte d'Arthur
episodes.description: Arthur is mortally wounded, and Merlin risks everything to save him.
